title: Git Workflow Sequence - Branch Management and Collaboration
description: Complete git workflow for feature development, branch management, and collaborative development
purpose: Provide systematic approach to git operations maintaining clean history and enabling collaboration
scope: All git operations including branching, merging, and repository management
commanders_intent: How do we manage code changes systematically while enabling collaboration and maintaining project history?
trigger_conditions: Preparing for code review and merge

sequence_steps.description: Create isolated branch for feature development
Keep feature branch updated with main branch
Clean up commit history and prepare for code review

success_criteria: Clean feature branches with logical commits
No merge conflicts in pull requests
